## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

- [ ] My code follows the project's coding standards
- [ ] I have run `npm run build` successfully
- [ ] I have run the self-audit (`npx tsx self-audit.ts`)
- [ ] I have updated the README if needed
- [ ] I have added the tool to the TOOLS array in `src/index.ts`
- [ ] I have created a handler in the appropriate `src/handlers/` file
- [ ] I have exported the handler from `src/handlers/index.ts`
- [ ] New constants are added to `src/core/constants.ts`
